name: Red ball of helium
description:
Short, I mean really short little school project.

Story, timed, easy puzzle game.

A little girl living in the underground world - except none of the residents realise that. But its time to get out. And not that she would have any other choice! The main generator powering the whole city is failing!

To play:

Extract the file and play "Red ball of helium"

Its point and click so clicking on the ground to move.

Have fun!)

Credit to Tobi Musil for the name duh! 

And dw didnt forget David Lusala as the music composer as his favourite rank!

Thanks a lot Viktorie Rizmanová
